Comments: **Parameter** for which the **alert** has been raised.

Value of the triggering parameter with data type corresponding to the parameter encoding:

* ``uint8``, ``uint16`` use *unsignedInt*
* ``int8``, ``int16``, ``int32`` use *signedInt*
* ``float32``, ``string``, ``base64string`` use *string*
* ``raw`` uses *data*

Relative change from prior value of the triggering parameter with data type corresponding to the parameter encoding:

* ``uint8``, ``uint16`` use *unsignedInt*
* ``int8``, ``int16``, ``int32`` use *signedInt*
* ``float32``, ``string``, ``base64string`` use *string*
* ``raw`` uses *data*

Alert timestamp, seconds since *1970-01-01T00:00:00Z*.

Only present if configured in *metadata* options.
A set of parameter values defined by the **alert** configuration.

Value with data type corresponding to the parameter encoding:

* ``uint8``, ``uint16`` use *unsignedInt*
* ``int8``, ``int16``, ``int32`` use *signedInt*
* ``float32``, ``string``, ``base64string`` use *string*
* ``raw`` uses *data*

Parameter timestamp in seconds since *1970-01-01T00:00:00Z*.

Only present if ``paramTimestamp`` is configured in *metadata* options.

Alert parameter timestamp, seconds since *1970-01-01T00:00:00Z*.

Only present if ``paramTimestamp`` configured in *metadata* options.

Latitude in milliminutes, if present in *metadata* options.

Divide by 60000 to get decimal degrees (round to 6 decimal places precision).

Longitude in milliminutes, if present in *metadata* options.

Divide by 60000 to get decimal degrees (round to 6 decimal places precision).
Altitude in meters above sea level, if present in *metadata* options.
